category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_on_demand_sync_broadcast_mode
preference.preference_description: Controls the report function's query scope when the site known by the current site as the owning site denies ownership. Valid Values: TRUE - Queries all known sites to find the owner (broadcast mode). FALSE - Performs sequential queries to sites in the ownership chain until it reaches the limit designated by the TC_follow_ownership_chain_max_site_count preference.
